name: Spring Home Spring Roll Pastry
description: The quintessential product for making Spring Rolls and other delicious pastry snacks. Absorbs less oil. Easy to separate and peel. Remains crispy for long periods. Minimal breakage and wastage. Double fry capabilities. Cooking Method : Ready-to-eat, Oven Bake, Deep Fry, Pan Fry, Air Fry. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
